Senevirathne presented a special proposal to the President on this occasion.The President presented souvenirs to three seniors of the Sri Lanka Freedom Trade Union Federation.General Secretary of the UPFA Minister Mahinda Amaraweera, State Minister Lakshman Yapa Abeywardena, Former Minister Athavuda Senevirathne, General Secretary of Sri Lanka Nidahas Sevaka Sangamaya Leslie Devendra, and General Secretary of the Sri Lanka Freedom Trade Union Federation W. Roy de Mel were among those participated on this occasion.President Maithripala Sirisena says the Trade Union Movement of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party (SLFP) contributed to make a huge transformation in the economic, social and cultural sectors of the country.
